Qubit Indices (fd_greens.qubit_indices)

class QubitIndices(system_indices: List[List[int]], ancilla_indices: List[List[int]] = [[]])[source]

Bases: object

Qubit indices of system and ancilla qubits.

Initializes a QubitIndices object.

For example, if we are considering [0, 1] and [1, 1] on the system qubits, and [0] on the ancilla, we would initialize an QubitIndices object as

qubit_indices = QubitIndices([[0, 1], [1, 1]], [[0]])
Parameters

  • system_indices – A sequence of system qubits indices.

  • ancilla_indices – A sequence of ancilla qubit indices.

copy() → fd_greens.cirq_ver.qubit_indices.QubitIndices[source]

Returns a copy of itself.

property system: fd_greens.cirq_ver.qubit_indices.QubitIndices

Returns a QubitIndices object of the system qubit indices.

property ancilla: fd_greens.cirq_ver.qubit_indices.QubitIndices

Returns a QubitIndices object of the ancilla qubit indices.

transform(method_indices_pairs: Iterable[Tuple[str, Sequence[int]]]) → None[source]

Transforms a QubitIndices object.

static get_eh_qubit_indices_dict(n_qubits: int, spin: str, method_indices_pairs: Iterable[Tuple[str, Sequence[int]]] = [], system_only: bool = False) → Mapping[str, fd_greens.cirq_ver.qubit_indices.QubitIndices][source]

Returns the qubit indices of (N+-1)-electron states.

Parameters

  • n_qubits – Number of qubits.

  • spin – The spin of the second-quantized operators.

  • method_indices_pairs – Pairs of Z2 transform methods and indices.

  • system_only – Whether to return only system qubit indices.

Returns

qubits_indices_dict – A dictionary from subscripts to qubit indices.

static get_excited_qubit_indices_dict(n_qubits: int, method_indices_pairs: Iterable[Tuple[str, Sequence[int]]], system_only: bool = False) → Mapping[str, fd_greens.cirq_ver.qubit_indices.QubitIndices][source]

Returns the qubit indices of N-electron excited states.

Parameters

  • n_qubits – Number of qubits.

  • method_indices_pairs – Pairs of Z2 transform methods and indices.

  • system_only – Whether to return only system qubit indices.

Returns

qubit_indices_dict – A dictionary from subscripts ot qubit indices.
